GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
kprobes: Skip clearing aggrprobe's post_handler in kprobe-on-ftrace case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit 7d606ae1abcc3eab5408e42444d789dc7def51b8, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 0bc11ed5ab60c135aa764a62c02cd5ea68289de4. For more details please see the references link.
